Detailed Description

Handles reviews of pois in ParserThread.

Member Function Documentation

int ParserPoiReviewHandler::deleteReview (  uint32  uin,
const MC2String &  review_id
) 
 

Delete a review, should only be done by owner or admin.

Parameters:
uin The user requesting this.
review_id The id of the review to delete.
Returns:
0 if ok, -1 if error, -2 if timeout, -3 if no such review, -4 if not allowed.

int ParserPoiReviewHandler::listReviews (  uint32  ownerUIN,
const MC2String &  review_id,
const MC2String &  poiID,
PoiReviewEnums::reviewDetails_t  detail,
LangTypes::language_t  lang,
vector< PoiReviewItem * > &  reviews
) 
 

List review from user, review_id or poiID.

The first non empty/0 one is used.

Parameters:
review_id The review to list.
detail The level of details.
lang The language of the review?
review A new item on which load is called if ok else NULL.
Returns:
0 if ok, -1 if error, -2 if timeout, -3 if no review found.

int ParserPoiReviewHandler::poiReview (  uint32  uin,
const MC2String &  poiID,
uint32  grade,
LangTypes::language_t  lang,
MC2String &  out_review_id,
const MC2String &  review_id = MC2String(),
const MC2String &  title = MC2String(),
const MC2String &  text = MC2String()
) 
 

Add poi review, or just grade one if review_id set but not title and text.

Modify a review by setting review_id and title and text.

Parameters:
uin The user requesting this.
poiID The map's id of the poi, for this map release.
grade The grade of the poi.
lang The language of the review, only used if title and text is set.
review_id The id of a existing review to grade or change.
title Text with the title of the review.
text Text with the review text.
Returns:
0 if ok, -1 if error, -2 if timeout, -3 if no such review, -4 if not allowed.
